Hi there!

You're reading my blog.

Ok, so what? Well, I made a huge fuss about never making a blog. But after over a year of being bothered about it, I finally did! Good job guys! ğŸ¤£

So, why? Well, it's because uploading org files in raw format to my Github account was looking kinda shoddy. And, as many people know, I do NOT like to look shoddy.

So, it was prompted by a few comments online (like here for instance) which just made me hide my face in my hands ğŸ¤¦ğŸ¼â€â™€ï¸ and say okâ€¦screw it. I'll make a blog. Instead, since I was posting about Emacs stuff (mostly), I wanted it to be where I can get geek cred: ğŸ‘©ğŸ¼â€ğŸ’» on Github.
